verses.text: Rejoice in the \sc Lord\sc*, O ye righteous: \add For\add* praise is comely for the upright.
Praise the \sc Lord\sc* with harp: Sing unto him with the psaltery \add and\add* an instrument of ten strings.
Sing unto him a new song; Play skilfully with a loud noise.
For the word of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* right; And all his works \add are done\add* in truth.
He loveth righteousness and judgment: The earth is full \add of\add* the goodness of the \sc Lord\sc*.
By the word of the \sc Lord\sc* were the heavens made; And all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
He gathereth the waters of the sea together as a heap: He layeth up the depth in storehouses.
Let all the earth fear the \sc Lord\sc*: Let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
For he spake, and it was \add done;\add* He commanded, and it stood fast.
The \sc Lord\sc* bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: He maketh the devices of the people of none effect.
The counsel of the \sc Lord\sc* standeth for ever, The thoughts of his heart to all generations.
Blessed \add is\add* the nation whose God \add is\add* the \sc Lord\sc*; \add And\add* the people \add whom\add* he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
The \sc Lord\sc* looketh from heaven; He beholdeth all the sons of men.
From the place of his habitation he looketh Upon all the inhabitants of the earth.
He fashioneth their hearts alike; He considereth all their works.
There is no king saved by the multitude of a host: A mighty \add man\add* is not delivered by much strength.
A horse \add is\add* a vain thing for safety: Neither shall he deliver \add any\add* by his great strength.
Behold, the eye of the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* upon them that fear him, Upon them that hope in his mercy;
To deliver their soul from death, And to keep them alive in famine.
Our soul waiteth for the \sc Lord\sc*: He \add is\add* our help and our shield.
For our heart shall rejoice in him, Because we have trusted in his holy name.
Let thy mercy, O \sc Lord\sc*, be upon us, According as we hope in thee.
